transcripts.text: Hey guys, it's Larissa.  And I'm Joel.
And right now we're standing in the Center for Music and Worship Arts.

Liberty University is actually the seventh largest school of music in the nation.  And right now we're standing in our concert hall, which seats 1,600.  It also features a unique Meyer Sound Constellation System, which can make it sound like any theater or concert hall in the world.

Yeah, the other cool part about this building is actually our academic side.  So within that side, we have our Mac labs, our recording studios, and even over 30 practice rooms.  So whether you're a music major or not, and you just want to learn an instrument, you can come and do that or continue playing when you already know.
And that's a little bit about our School of Music and the Worship Arts.
